item.description:
KidsBuild! needs volunteers and materials donations and the Emerging Professionals Network wants to help!!!

KidsBuild!, the decade-old hands-on BSA initiative that has engaged thousands of children in learning about architecture and urban design, is in the works for Friday, May 29 from 3:00 to 7:00 and Saturday, May 30 from 10:00 am to 3:00 pm at Boston's Institute of Contemporary Art.
The Emerging Professionals Network is encouraging volunteers to sign up for the Thursday and Friday sessions!

If you are interested in volunteering, contact kidsbuild2009@yahoo.com for a volunteer sign-up form. Time slots available are Thursday, May 28 (10:00 am to 5:00 pm), Friday, May 29 (8:30 am to 8:00 pm) and Saturday, May 30 (9:00 am to 6:30 pm).

You MUST sign up through kidsbuild to volunteer - an RSVP on Meetup is not sufficient

The planning committee has already started accepting material donations; the final drop-off date is Thursday, May 7 at Beacon Architectural Associates (145 South Street, Boston) from 5:30 to 7:00 pm. Please visit the KidsBuild! webpage at www.architects.org/kidsbuild to download a donation form and box labels.


Photo courtesy of http://committees.arc...
item.name: KidsBuild! - Call for Volunteers
